text: Keterisi () is a village in the historical region of Khevi, north-eastern Georgia. It is located on the right bank of the river Tergi. Administratively, it is part of the Kazbegi Municipality in Mtskheta-Mtianeti. Distance to the municipality center Stepantsminda is 32 km. == See also == *Ketrisi Mineral Vaucluse == Sources == * Georgian Soviet Encyclopedia, V. 2, pp. 478–479, Tbilisi, 1980 year. * ქეთერისის მინერალური ვოკლუზის ბუნების ძეგლი ==References== Category:Kobi Community villages
title: Keterisi
